# 1. Data preparation

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_data_prep
library(metadat)
library(dplyr)
library(officer)
library(psychometric)
X <- dat.bakdash2021
X$SampleID <- gsub("Gugerty1997Exp.", "Gugerty1997", X$SampleID)
X <- X %>% mutate(study_id = dense_rank(SampleID))
X$study_id <- as.factor(X$study_id)
X <- X[order(X$study_id), ]

bakdash_ref <- docx_summary(read_docx("../Supplementary Data SD/SD 2.1 bakdash2021_references.docx"))$text
bakdash_authors <- read.table(text = gsub("\\d+", "+", bakdash_ref), sep = "+", quote = "", fill = T)[, 1]
# write.csv(bakdash_authors, file = "../data/bakdash_authors_per_paper.csv")
bakdash_authors <- read.csv2("../Supplementary Data SD/SD 2.2 bakdash_authors_per_paper_done.csv", header = F)[, 1]

bakdash_authors <- gsub(" ", "", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("DavidB.Kaber", "DavidKaber", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("NevilleA.Stanton", "N.A.Stanton", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("NAStanton", "N.A.Stanton", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("Shiau-FengLin", "S.-F.Lin", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("Tsung-LingHsieh", "T.-L.Hsieh", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("ThomasZ.Strybel", "T.Z.Strybel", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("TracyMcConnell-Henry", "TMcConnell-Henry", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("VanessaBowden", "VanessaK.Bowden", bakdash_authors)
bakdash_authors <- gsub("YuZhang", "Y.Zhang", bakdash_authors)

bakdash_author_list <- unique(unlist((strsplit(bakdash_authors, "\\,"))))
#sort(bakdash_author_list)
X_author_list <- bakdash_author_list

X$authors <- strsplit(bakdash_authors, "\\,")[X$study_id]
```

# 2. Networks

## 2.1. Bipartite edges

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_bipartite_edges
X_studies <- X[!duplicated(X$study_id), ]
X_bipartite_edges <- lapply(X_studies$authors, function(x){X_author_list %in% x})
X_bipartite_edges <- do.call("cbind", X_bipartite_edges)
rownames(X_bipartite_edges) <- X_author_list
```

## 2.2. Co-author overlap network

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_coauthor_overlap_network
#| warning: false
library(statnet)
par(mar = c(0,0,0,0))
X_shared_authors <- t(X_bipartite_edges) %*% X_bipartite_edges
X_network <- as.network(X_shared_authors, directed = F)
plot.network(X_network, edge.col = "black",
             edge.lwd = X_shared_authors)
X_geo.dist <- geodist(X_network)
```

# 3. Analysis

## 3.1. Effect sizes

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_effect_sizes
library(metafor)
X_effect <- X
X_effect$yi <- X_effect$es.z
X_effect$vi <- X_effect$vi.z
```

## 3.2. Correlogram

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_correlogram
X_effect_dist_mat <- as.matrix(stats::dist(X_effect$yi))
X_effect_sim_mat <- 1 - (X_effect_dist_mat/max(X_effect_dist_mat))
X_geo_dist_mat <- X_geo.dist$gdist
colnames(X_geo_dist_mat) <- 1:ncol(X_geo_dist_mat)
effects_per_study <- X_effect %>% group_by(study_id) %>% count()

geo_dist_vec <- vector()
for(i in 1:length(unique(X$study_id))){
  geo_dist_vec <- c(geo_dist_vec, rep(rep(X_geo_dist_mat[i, ],
                                          times = effects_per_study$n),
                                      times = effects_per_study$n[i]))
}
X_geo_dist_mat_full <- matrix(data = geo_dist_vec, ncol = nrow(X_effect),
                              nrow = nrow(X_effect))
colnames(X_geo_dist_mat_full) <- 1:ncol(X_geo_dist_mat_full)

X_mantel_corlog <- ncf::mantel.correlog(X_geo_dist_mat_full, X_effect_sim_mat,
                                      increment = 1, resamp = 1)
plot(X_mantel_corlog)
tail(X_mantel_corlog$correlation, n = 1)
```

## 3.3. Similarity matrices

### 3.3.1. Inv.geo

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_similarity_matrix_invgeo
X_inv.geo <- 1 - tail(X_mantel_corlog$correlation, n = 1) *
  X_geo.dist$gdist / max(X_geo.dist$gdist[which(is.finite(X_geo.dist$gdist))])
X_inv.geo[X_inv.geo == -Inf] <- 0
hist(X_inv.geo[X_inv.geo > 0], main = "inv.geo values > 0")
```

### 3.3.2. Jaccard

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_similarity_matrix_jaccard
jaccard <- function(a, b){
    intersection = length(intersect(a, b))
    union = length(a) + length(b) - intersection
    return(intersection/union)
}

X_jaccard_matrix <- matrix(data = NA, ncol = length(unique(X$study_id)),
                           nrow = length(unique(X$study_id)))
for(i in 1:length(unique(X$study_id))){
  for(j in 1:length(unique(X$study_id))){
    X_jaccard_matrix[i, j] <- jaccard(X_studies$authors[[i]], X_studies$authors[[j]])
  }
}
colnames(X_jaccard_matrix) <- 1:ncol(X_jaccard_matrix)
hist(X_jaccard_matrix[X_jaccard_matrix > 0], main = "Jaccard values > 0")
```

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_similarity_matrix_jaccard_correlogram
jaccard_vec <- vector()
for(i in 1:length(unique(X$study_id))){
  jaccard_vec <- c(jaccard_vec, rep(rep(X_jaccard_matrix[i, ],
                                          times = effects_per_study$n),
                                      times = effects_per_study$n[i]))
}
X_jaccard_mat_full <- matrix(data = jaccard_vec, ncol = nrow(X_effect),
                             nrow = nrow(X_effect))
colnames(X_jaccard_mat_full) <- 1:ncol(X_jaccard_mat_full)

X_mantel_corlog_jaccard <- ncf::mantel.correlog(X_jaccard_mat_full, X_effect_sim_mat,
                                      increment = .1, resamp = 1)
plot(X_mantel_corlog_jaccard)
head(X_mantel_corlog_jaccard$correlation, n = 1)
```

### 3.3.3. Inv.geo + Jaccard

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_similarity_matrix_invgeo_jaccard
X_invgeo_jaccard <- X_inv.geo + X_jaccard_matrix
colnames(X_invgeo_jaccard) <- 1:ncol(X_invgeo_jaccard)
hist(X_invgeo_jaccard[X_invgeo_jaccard > 0],
     main = "Combination of inv.geo and jaccard > 0")
```

## 3.4. RMA

### 3.4.1. Preparation

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_rma_prep
library(dplyr)
colnames(X_inv.geo) <- 1:ncol(X_inv.geo)
X_effect$study_id.phyl <- X_effect$study_id
X_effect <- X_effect[order(X_effect$study_id), ]
X_effect <- X_effect %>%
  group_by(study_id) %>%
  mutate(obs = row_number())
X_effect$obs <- as.factor(X_effect$obs)

library(igraph)
X_effect$membership <- NA
walktrap <- graph_from_adjacency_matrix(X_shared_authors) |> cluster_walktrap()
counts <- table(X_effect$study_id)
X_effect$membership <- as.factor(rep(walktrap$membership, times = counts))
```

### 3.4.2. Null model

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_null_model
#| eval: false
X.rma.null <- rma.mv(es.z, vi.z, random = list(~1|study_id/obs),
                      data = X_effect)
save(X.rma.null, file = "bakdash.rma.null.Rdata")
```

### 3.4.3. Inv.geo model

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_invgeo_model
#| eval: false
X.rma.full.invgeo <- rma.mv(yi, V = vi, random = list(~1|study_id/obs,
                                                         ~1|study_id.phyl),
              R = list(study_id.phyl = X_inv.geo), data = X_effect)
save(X.rma.full.invgeo, file = "bakdash.rma.full.invgeo.Rdata")
```

### 3.4.4. Jaccard model

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_jaccard_model
#| eval: false
X.rma.full.jaccard <- rma.mv(yi, V = vi, random = list(~1|study_id/obs,
                                                         ~1|study_id.phyl),
              R = list(study_id.phyl = X_jaccard_matrix), data = X_effect)
save(X.rma.full.jaccard, file = "bakdash.rma.full.jaccard.Rdata")
```

### 3.4.5. Inv.geo + Jaccard model

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_invgeo_jaccard_model
#| eval: false
X.rma.full.invgeo_jaccard <- rma.mv(yi, V = vi, random = list(~1|study_id/obs,
                                                         ~1|study_id.phyl),
              R = list(study_id.phyl = X_invgeo_jaccard), data = X_effect)
save(X.rma.full.invgeo_jaccard, file = "bakdash.rma.full.invgeo_jaccard.Rdata")
```

### 3.4.6. Summary

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_rma_all
load("bakdash.rma.null.Rdata")
load("bakdash.rma.full.invgeo.Rdata")
load("bakdash.rma.full.jaccard.Rdata")
load("bakdash.rma.full.invgeo_jaccard.Rdata")
summary(X.rma.null)
summary(X.rma.full.invgeo)
summary(X.rma.full.jaccard)
summary(X.rma.full.invgeo_jaccard)
```

## 3.5. Plots

### 3.5.1. Model comparison

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_model_comparison_plot
mod_comp <- data.frame("model" = c("Null model", "Invgeo model",
                                       "Jaccard model", "Invgeo jaccard model"),
                       "beta" = c(X.rma.null$beta, X.rma.full.invgeo$beta,
                                  X.rma.full.jaccard$beta,
                                  X.rma.full.invgeo_jaccard$beta),
                       "se" = c(X.rma.null$se, X.rma.full.invgeo$se,
                                X.rma.full.jaccard$se,
                                X.rma.full.invgeo_jaccard$se))

forest(mod_comp$beta, vi = mod_comp$se^2, slab = mod_comp$model,
       header = "Effect size and CI of the different models")
```

### 3.5.2. Adjusted effect sizes

#### 3.5.2.1. Calculation

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_adjusted_effects
############################ invgeo ##############################
X_ranef_invgeo <- ranef(X.rma.full.invgeo)
rep_vec <- X_effect %>% group_by(study_id) %>% count()

adjusted_effects_invgeo <- X.rma.full.invgeo$beta + rep(X_ranef_invgeo$study_id$intrcpt, rep_vec$n) +
  X_ranef_invgeo$`study_id/obs`$intrcpt

adjusted_effects_invgeo_se <- X.rma.full.invgeo$se + rep(X_ranef_invgeo$study_id$se, rep_vec$n) +
  X_ranef_invgeo$`study_id/obs`$se

ad_effect_dist_mat_invgeo <- as.matrix(dist(adjusted_effects_invgeo))
ad_effect_sim_mat_invgeo <- 1 - (ad_effect_dist_mat_invgeo/max(ad_effect_dist_mat_invgeo))

ad_mantel_corlog_geodist <- ncf::mantel.correlog(X_geo_dist_mat_full, ad_effect_sim_mat_invgeo, increment = 1, resamp = 0)
############################ jaccard ##############################
X_ranef_jaccard <- ranef(X.rma.full.jaccard)

adjusted_effects_jaccard <- X.rma.full.jaccard$beta + rep(X_ranef_jaccard$study_id$intrcpt, rep_vec$n) +
  X_ranef_jaccard$`study_id/obs`$intrcpt

adjusted_effects_jaccard_se <- X.rma.full.jaccard$se + rep(X_ranef_jaccard$study_id$se, rep_vec$n) +
  X_ranef_jaccard$`study_id/obs`$se

ad_effect_dist_mat_jaccard <- as.matrix(dist(adjusted_effects_jaccard))
ad_effect_sim_mat_jaccard <- 1 - (ad_effect_dist_mat_jaccard/max(ad_effect_dist_mat_jaccard))

ad_mantel_corlog_jaccard <- ncf::mantel.correlog(X_jaccard_mat_full, ad_effect_sim_mat_jaccard, increment = .1, resamp = 0)
```

#### 3.5.2.3. Forest plot

```{r}
#| label: bakdash_forest_plot
#| fig.width: 12
#| fig.height: 12
set.seed(42)
studies_to_plot <- sample(1:678, 20, replace = F)
par(mar = c(4,4,1,1), family = "A")
forest(X.rma.full.invgeo$yi[studies_to_plot], vi = X.rma.full.invgeo$vi[studies_to_plot], ylim = c(-2.5, 23),
       xlim = c(-1.5,2), header = T, slab = paste(word(X$Author[X_effect$study_id[studies_to_plot]], 1), "et al.",
                                              str_extract(X$Year[studies_to_plot], "\\d+")))
addpoly(adjusted_effects_invgeo[studies_to_plot], sei = adjusted_effects_invgeo_se[studies_to_plot], row = 1:20,
        col = "gray", annotate = F, border = F)
par(new = TRUE, family = "A")
forest(X.rma.full.invgeo$yi[studies_to_plot], X.rma.full.invgeo$vi[studies_to_plot], xlim = c(-1.5, 2), ylim = c(-2.5, 23),
       annotate = F, xlab = "", slab = NA)
addpoly(X.rma.null, row = -1, mlab = "RE Model")
addpoly(X.rma.full.invgeo, mlab = "RE Model (Adjusted Effect)")
abline(h = 0)
```
